parameters.name: IsSuppressed
parameters.description: True to suppress this pattern instance, false to not

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index indicating where to add this pattern instance in the pattern table and pattern; -1 indicates to add this pattern instance to the end of the pattern table and pattern (see Remarks )

title: IDimPatternFeatureData.AddInstanceAt
description: Adds a pattern instance to this variable pattern feature.
signature:
System.Boolean AddInstanceAt( 
   System.Boolean
IsSuppressed
,
   System.Int32
Index
)

parameters.name: IsSuppressed
parameters.description: True to suppress this pattern instance, false to not

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index indicating where to add this pattern instance in the pattern table and pattern; -1 indicates to add this pattern instance to the end of the pattern table and pattern (see Remarks )

returns: True if the pattern instance is added, false if not
remarks:
Use
IDimPatternFeatureData::GetInstanceCount
to get the number of pattern instances.
By default, this pattern instance inherits the default values of the parent sketch or feature of the variable pattern feature. Use
IDimPatternFeatureData::SetInstanceDimensionValue
to modify this pattern instance's values.
